Prim Examples
-------------

Examples constructing :class:`~libcasm.xtal.Prim` with different types of degrees of freedom (DoF).

    :maxdepth: 2

    Occupation DoF <occ>
    Atomic displacement DoF <disp>
    Magnetic spin DoF <magspin>
    Strain DoF <strain>
    Coupled DoF <coupled>
